name: @legal-case-manager/database
description: PostgreSQL 18 database layer with Drizzle ORM for Legal Case Manager

scripts.db:restart: npm run db:stop && npm run db:start
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:stop && docker volume rm legal-case-manager_postgres_data && npm run db:start && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:backup: docker exec legal_postgres pg_dump -U root legal_case_manager > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i legal_postgres psql -U root legal_case_manager < backup.sql
scripts.db:psql: docker exec -it legal_postgres psql -U root -d legal_case_manager
